TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDocumentStructureProvider

summary.span: Definiert eine Methode zum Hinzufügen des -Teils der XML Paper Specification (XPS) in ein XPS-Paket.

span.span: Defines a method for adding the part of XML Paper Specification (XPS) to an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Weitere Informationen zu der `DocumentStructure` Element des ein [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] Verpacken, finden Sie in Kapitel 9 der [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] -Spezifikation, die Sie, am erhalten können [XPS: Spezifikation und License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure AddDocumentStructure() cil managed

summary.span: Fügt den -Teil von [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] zu einem [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]-Paket hinzu.

span.span: Adds the part of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
An that represents the part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Weitere Informationen zu der `DocumentStructure` Element des ein [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] Verpacken, finden Sie in Kapitel 9 von der [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] -Spezifikation, die Sie, am erhalten können [XPS: Spezifikation und die Lizenz heruntergeladen](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
